attributes.action: Replace the House of Lords with a New Elected House.
attributes.background: The House of Lords is a bloated, unaccountable, non-elected body who decide upon our laws without our consent. Populated by members elected by the Prime Minister of the time. It is now time to have a true democracy. Especially after Lord Sewel's disgraceful use of public money.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104682

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
